title: Announcing: Evaluation Of The ‘Agent Control Plane’ Market
description: The choice of Agentic AI technology for enterprise leaders is best understood as an ecosystem of tech vendors that align with three functional planes: the need to build agents, to embed them into business workflows, and to manage and govern them at scale. The…
